CustomField.description: Indicates how the accrual value of the related Payee Leave Rule will be determined. This will either match the calculated Deduction Units or use the Payee Leave Rule calculation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates how the accrual value of the related Payee Leave Rule will be determined. This will either match the calculated Deduction Units or use the Payee Leave Rule calculation.
CustomField.label: Purchased Leave Accrual Basis
